cases.title: Clock built in React
cases.description: For this project I built a clock by using state in React. Also, I added buttons that pauses the clock and makes the clock run again. A JavaScript function makes the background change based on the time of the day.

cases.title: Radio player built in React using SR:s API
cases.description: This project aimed at creating a working radio player. By using Sveriges Radio API I could fetch information about the radio channels and fetch playable audio stream urls.

cases.title: FAQ-site with JavaScript
cases.description: In this poject I practiced on using the JavaScript toggle function to build a FAQ-accordion to show and hide text.

cases.title: Product listing with React
cases.description: With a JSON-file with an array of multiple pharmacy products I built a webpage with the look of an e-commerce store. I used the JSON-file to render a React component for each product. Added hover effect to display more information.

cases.title: A design brief comes to life in React
cases.description: For this project I was given a design brief, which I used to build a responsive website.

cases.title: New career page for Comprend
cases.description: The project brief was to create a career page for the consultancy company Comprend. My team used Comprend's internal career API to build four different pages. Data was fetched to display a job listing tablecontaining a job listing with filter function and information of available jobs.
